traits.name: (Controller) Distraction
traits.detail: Halve your attack damage to grant advantage to the next attack roll made against the target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The dragon makes two with its claws and one with its immolate.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4, d6] slashing damage.

actions.name: Immolate
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ the target takes [damage/2] fire damage per round until it or an ally puts out the fire.

actions.name: Brilliant Beam
actions.detail: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ the target takes 2d6 radiant damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (recharge 4/5/6)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 60' cone must make a DC 20 DEX save or take [damage/2, d10] fire damage (half damage on successful save).

actions.name: Blinding Presence (1/day)
actions.detail: Each creature within 120' of Helios must make a DC 17 CON save or be blinded (save ends).
